Description: The function msr_mtrr_valid() only validates whether a given MSR number falls within a set of hard‑coded, architecturally defined MTRR/PAT MSRs. It neither performs access to the MSRs nor makes any authorization decisions about who may read/write them; it is a pure predicate used as part of larger logic. There are no user identities, permissions, or role checks involved, and the function itself does not gate any privileged operation. Therefore, based solely on this code, there is no indication of improper access control (CWE‑284) in this function.
